0.author: Niels Bohr
0.body: An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field.

1.author: Carl Sagan
1.body: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

2.author: Albert Einstein
2.body: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.

3.author: Albert Einstein
3.body: Never memorize something that you can look up.
